FilterTypeTagsName.description: The singular name of the filter type used for tags.

FilterTypeTagsNamePlural.description: The plural name of the filter type used for tags.

FilterTypeTagsLabelNone.message: You have not filtered any tags yet.
FilterTypeTagsLabelNone.description: The message displayed when the user does not have any filtered tags.

FilterTypeTagsLabelHelp.message: You can filter tags by adding them below.
FilterTypeTagsLabelHelp.description: The message displayed to help the user filter new tags.

FilterTypeTagsPlaceholderText.description: The message displayed on the placeholder for deviations filtered by a tag
